search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4401_:
Check out my outfit! It’s the pinnacle of fashion,
don’t you think?!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4402_:
What a lovely beach... I just wish I had brought
my swimsuit.
*sigh*

It’s not so bad, is it? I mean, you can enjoy the
beach without swimming, right?

You just don’t get it, do you? I should be wearing
a swimsuit that fits a beach as beautiful as this.
I’d look great swimming in the ocean here!

Yeah, it’s true that people can bring out their
charm by focusing on the right outfit and setting.

But as a model, no matter where I am or what I’m
wearing, the real dazzle comes from me.
A swimsuit would be awesome, too!

You’ve got a point. A swimsuit does make its
wearer shine on a beach. But I can shine in
any outfit!

Your sygna suit makes you stand out
even more on the beach!

Aw, thanks! It makes me really happy to hear you
say that!
I’ll dazzle everyone with this sygna suit!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4403_:
It feels great to shout at the ocean! You should try
it, too!
Sounds like fun. Let’s see... What should I yell?
Sounds good! I’ll show you my passion!

Wooper stubbed its toe and cried out!
“Wooowww!”

Wooo... Owww... A pun?! How did I feel such
passion from a pun?!
I like that! I’m fired up!

Rhydon’s my favorite Pokémon! I think it’s
“right on!”
Rhydon... Right on... A pun?! I didn’t expect that!

I can’t believe you put so much emotion into
a pun!

I never knew puns could be so awesome! Let me
try one out, too!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4404_:
Ahahaha! You look like you’re in a good
mood, Surskit!

Look at those two over there. They look like they’re
having a lot of fun!

Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s join in the
fun! Come on—we don’t come to the beach often!

That’s what I wanted to hear! Let’s go talk
to them!
I like your style! Let’s go talk to them!

Wait, are you...THE Elesa?! Omigosh, of course!
You don’t mind, right, Surskit?
Thanks! Now, let’s do something fun! Any ideas?
How about a foot race? OK, let’s go!

That was so much fun! It feels great to run all-out
once in a while, doesn’t it?
Ahhh! Elesa running on the beach... So gorgeous!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4405_:
While we’re waiting for Viola, you can count
on me behind the camera!
Thanks, Skyla! All right, then let’s get started!

OK then, Swanna! It’s time to fly into the
Pasio skies!
Looking good! You wanna see how it turned out?
You can even see the arena!
Wow, you’re right! It looks so small!

Yeah. It really puts into perspective how
impressive Pasio is, doesn’t it?

But...you were too far from us, Skyla. I can’t
even make out our faces.
You know what? It’s a nice picture. Thanks, Skyla!

Of course! And if you ever want to see that view
for real, let me know!

Leave it to The Highflying Girl! I’ll take you as high
up as you want!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4406_:
Hmm, Viola’s not here yet. Why don’t I take that
picture for you?

I take pictures of my Pokémon from time to time,
so I think I’d be a good photographer!

Oh, I didn’t know you were into photography.
Then yeah! If you wouldn’t mind.

Ahahaha! Look, look! I think it turned out pretty
good, if I do say so myself!

There are more shadows than there
are people...

Yeah, it sure looks like there are ghosts all around
us in this photo... It would probably scare most
normal people.

Yeah, it sure looks like there are ghosts all around
us in this photo... It would probably scare most
normal people.

Haha! Taking pictures is so much fun!
Next time, I’ll take even more amazing ones!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4407_: Hi, sorry. Would you mind taking our picture?

E-E-Elesa...talked to m-m-me! Of course!
I-I-I’d love to!

Thanks! Make sure [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s in
the shot too, OK?
Sorry, they’re all fans of you, too.

You got a picture with Elesa! What I wouldn’t give
to be in your shoes!
